ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Miscellaneous comments on study, interview, methodology relevant to this form data
When I set expectations for my child, I am almost certain that I can help him/her meet them.
Notes: 1 = Strongly agree; 2 = Somewhat agree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat disagree; 5= Strongly Disagree

ElementDescription: I am often able to predict my child's behavior in situations.
Notes: 1 = Strongly agree; 2 = Somewhat agree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat disagree; 5= Strongly Disagree

ElementDescription: When my child gets angry I can usually deal with him/her if I stay calm.
Notes: 1 = Strongly agree; 2 = Somewhat agree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat disagree; 5= Strongly Disagree

ElementDescription: What I do has little effect on my child's behavior.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: No matter how hard a parent tries, some children will never learn to mind.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: My child usually ends up getting his/her way, so why try.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: When something goes wrong between me and my child, there is little I can do to correct it.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: Parents should address problems with their children because ignoring them won't make them go away.
Notes: 1 = Strongly agree; 2 = Somewhat agree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat disagree; 5= Strongly Disagree

ElementDescription: It is not always wise to expect too much from my child because many things turn out to be a matter of good or bad luck anyway.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: If your child throws tantrums no matter what you try, you might as well give up.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: I am responsible for my child's behavior.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: Capable people who fail to become good parents have not followed through on their own opportunities.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: My child's behavior problems are no one's fault but my own.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: Parents whose children make them feel helpless just aren't using the best parenting techniques.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: There is no such thing as good or bad children- just good or bad parents.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: Parents who can't get their children to listen to them don't understand how to get along with'their children.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: Most children's behavior problems would not have developed if their parents had had better parenting skills.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: Children's behavior problems are often due to mistakes their parents made.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: When my child is well-behaved, it is because he/she is responding to my efforts.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: The misfortunes and success I have had as a parent are a direct result of my own behavior.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: I feel like what happens in my life is mostly determined by my child.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: My child does not control my life.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: Even if your child frequently has tantrums, a parent should not give up.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: My child influences the number of friends I have.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: When I make a mistake with my child I am usually able to correct it.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: It is easy for me to avoid and function independently of my child's attempts to have control over me.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: My life is chiefly controlled by my child.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: Without the right breaks one cannot be an effective parent.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: Heredity plays the major role in determining a child's personality.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: Neither my child nor myself is responsible for his/her behavior.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: Success in dealing with children seems to be more a matter of the child's moods and feelings at the time rather than one's own actions.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: In order to have my plans work, I make sure they fit in with the desires of my child.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: I'm just one of those lucky parents who happened to have a good child.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: Most parents don't realize the extent to which how their children turn out is influenced by accidental happenings.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: Being a good parent often depends on being lucky enough to have a good child.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: I have often found that when it comes to my children, what is going to happen will happen.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: Fate was kind with me if I had had a bad child I don't know what I would have done.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: It is not too difficult to change my child's mind about something.
Notes: 1 = Strongly agree; 2 = Somewhat agree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat disagree; 5= Strongly Disagree

ElementDescription: My child's behavior is sometimes more than I can handle.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: Sometimes I feel that I do not have enough control over the direction my child's life taking.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: I always feel in control when it comes to my child.
Notes: 1 = Strongly agree; 2 = Somewhat agree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat disagree; 5= Strongly Disagree

ElementDescription: Sometimes I feel that my child's behavior is hopeless.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: It is often easier to let my child have his/her way than to put up with a tantrum.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: I allow my child to get away with things.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: I find that sometimes my child can get me to do things I really did not want to do.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: My child often behaves in a manner very different from the way I would want him/her to behave.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: Sometimes when I'm tired I let my children do things I normally wouldn't.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: Parental efficacy score
Notes: Sum of items 1 to 10

ElementDescription: Parental Control of Child's Life score
Notes: Sum of items 38 to 47
